onQueryChange(event.target.value)} className="pl-8 rounded-md focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300" />
); }; const DropDown = ({ toggle }) => { if (!toggle) { return null; } return (

); }; export default Search;
